name: GeneSeed
description:
"WASD" for movement

"Space" for Pause

Fertilize the Egg by smashing "F", If you do not want to fertilize just wait. 

Based on your collected genes your form after fertilization will differ. There are 11 different forms that you can take. We challenge you to unlock them and share them on our game's page. There are some hidden gems for the last two forms ;)

- Watch out for currents they will try to knock you out of the placenta.

 ( Watch Left Top Corner )

- Avoid other sperms and microscopic obstacles. 

- Finish the game whenever you want if you are happy with your collected genes.

- Beware!!! There are two types of genes as "evil" (purple) and "good" (white). This will affect the outcome.

- You only live once so create the best version of yourself by creating an awesome gene pool. 

All Forms: Zygote, Half-Human, Gollum, Regular Human, Hipster, Game Designer, Publisher, Holy One, Cursed One, Mighty Good Entity, The Elder One.

Share them on our page if you can unlock them! :D

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Every one of us has lived through the same deadly adventure. We were put into a race without our consent to literally fight for our lives. Losing that would have been the end for us... The eternal void...

We tried to create that experience for you... But this time you are fully conscious and will try to become the best/desired version of yourself to maximize the saturation of your life because you only live once!

Fight for your desired genes, gather them, choose between good and evil for the ultimate gene pool. Avoid hazards in a dark, lone adventure and finally, fertilize the egg and become one !!!

There are 11 different endings, discover all!

Do not forget to share your human forms in the comments section!
